Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
The powerful small phone that I always wished for !!
Nowadays the fad is big screen phones but for me, I like a small powerful phone with awesome camera. Ticked all the boxes that I had in my mind.
Switched from android. Never going back!
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

Camera quality is good if not the best, but in this amount you are getting more than expected. Still I have a complain abo...

The tecnician visited after complaining about the reception problem with Idea and Vodafone sims, he told me that the problem is not with the phone but with Idea and Vodafone. This model doesnt support Idea and Vodafone, for that I have to go to Idea or Vodafone office and talk to them. If this is the case, they should have mentioned it in the product description, If I know about these, I woundnt have bought this phone. It works well with Jio and BSNL. For Jio users, it is very good.

I have bought the 128GB Product RED version.

Display looks great, sound quality is great, camera quality is good and mainly the gaming performance is so smooth and fast and never felt a single frame drop ever.
Even though its costly for an "Budget" apple iphone, it's worth the money I have spent on this mobile.
Best ever from Iphone
this is my first apple device and i’m very glad that i bought this instead of OnePlues 7pro
The phone has awesome battery backup, sound quality,style , and camera

The phone has a supreme build and a sturdy feel in hands. Coming from a 6S, I felt it was a bit too wide, but It’ll grow on you. The RED is by far the best color among available. And this one is an absolute battery champ and won’t let you down. Charging is also pretty fast if you use a fast charger. I use an iPad 12W charger to top it up and it goes from 10% to 90% within 90 mins. If we take in the factor of longevity of the iPhones (iOS support and updates for atleast next 5 years), this is ...

After using android for 10 yrs m, i moved to iOS and i must say its very difficult to find n use iPhone...i will come to this later , let me start with features: nice camera but not better than samsung note 8.. display bright n good .. nice sound and very good look... a bit bulky...
What irritates me :
1. Setting ur fav song as ringtone: torture to do that...
2. 90% of good app either wallpaper or ringtones or utility: are paid..
3 iCloud only 5gb..
4. Not able to migrate chrome bookmarks ...
The phone as expected is great . After a week’s use it is a good for moderate user. Not checked on games and heavy applications. But performance is good.
@Flipkart When i received the phone it was shipped just in a simple plastic bag with original phone box. Please ask your seller to pack the same in and outer card board box.

The phone has awesome battery backup, sound quality,style , and camera

The phone has a supreme build and a sturdy feel in hands. Coming from a 6S, I felt it was a bit too wide, but It’ll grow on you. The RED is by far the best color among available. And this one is an absolute battery champ and won’t let you down. Charging is also pretty fast if you use a fast charger. I use an iPad 12W charger to top it up and it goes from 10% to 90% within 90 mins. If we take in the factor of longevity of the iPhones (iOS support and updates for atleast next 5 years), this is ...

After using android for 10 yrs m, i moved to iOS and i must say its very difficult to find n use iPhone...i will come to this later , let me start with features: nice camera but not better than samsung note 8.. display bright n good .. nice sound and very good look... a bit bulky...
What irritates me :
1. Setting ur fav song as ringtone: torture to do that...
2. 90% of good app either wallpaper or ringtones or utility: are paid..
3 iCloud only 5gb..

The phone as expected is great . After a week’s use it is a good for moderate user. Not checked on games and heavy applications. But performance is good.

* Fantastic and perfect cameras. 100% value for your money. PERFECT results. I am over satisfied (I am also a DSLR photographer). The zoom is REALLY good, try it in the daylight. Night mode is much superior as compared to the other handsets. The best part is that it has a front-facing ultra-wide-angle selfie camera too. Trust me, you'll NEVER regret once you buy it. Everything ...

I've been using Realme 6 Pro (6GB/128GB) since 10 days & from day 1 it had been a heck of an experience. I must say I've never seen such an amazing device in a decade, The uniqueness of this device is exactly what grabs the interest of the user.

The performance, the outlook ! Wow... Realme just did it. The 64 MP AI Quad Cam is a beast in itself.. and it feels good to have a Qual comm Snapdragon 720g processor I mean it's the next level. And how could I even forget to men...
Value for money phone...go for it
Camera : excellent...portrait mode is good...macro lens is also good
Selfie camera is on point
Performance wise this phone is a beast...pubg can be played seamlessly and smoothly
Battery is 4300 mah...but ultimately it depends on usage...if used lightly the phone cn run more than 1.5 days...if used heavily then the phone can go for 12 hours
All in all its the best deal...go for it 👍🏼

All in all its the best deal...go for it 👍🏼

It was so bad I sold the phone just 2 days after buying it. But then I decided to give this phone a go and has it surprised me. I went for 6+64 gb version in green color. Let me tell you a bit more about my experiences with the phone in last 4 days.
Pros:
1. Battery: I was hoping to get 6-7 hours of screen on time (SOT)...

• As loaded with SD712 the performance of is very smooth....

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.

2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...

Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...

reviews: Truly top class design and phenomenal performance. I have been using it from last 2-3 days and this really beats all other competitors in this segment. I have shifted to realme from xiaomi and this has been a great choice overall. Realme C2 handles all the daily tasks very efficiently and is even great for multitasking. One thing is for sure, the optimization and RAM management has been done really well and I have fallen in love with this powerful and beautiful beast.
nice phone performance is really good and battery quality awesome 👻👻😧😧 and pubg playing vary smooth 😍 😍 i like it this phone

What an amazing device. The diamond cut pattern looks amazing. It has textured finish(matt feel). So it gives you perfect grip to hold it. It will rarely slip from your hand. The display is gorgeous. Its bright and vibrant. You will surely be amazed on the first boot itself. Surprisingly the device doesn't feel heavy though it has massive 4000mah battery. As usual photos are coming nice and sharp. In this budget you really can't complain about it. Color OS 6.0 is much much better than its pre...

My honest opinion would that you cannot get anything better than this in this price range. The back camera and battery performance is totally awesome, screen quality is decent considering the price point and as you all know the design is so beautiful that it totally takes the points away from its competitors. I definitely give a thumbs up to realme for such great product.

Super product and the battery performance is great. I am using this device with a heavy multitasking but it is easily last more than a day with some battery left. The black color with a daimond design at the back is so appealing that you can go for it blindfolded. truely a masterpiece from realme in the budget segment. Realme Rocks!

Total Value for money... best phone at the price.. looks really premium and very good spec and configuration... very good camera quality and performance... very satified... and thank you flipkart for veey quick and fast delivery and packing was really good.. must go for this for budget smartphone
You are buying to your  Father or mother u can trust this one

All in all its the best deal...go for it 👍🏼

My story didn't went well with device, first time i received product which was bit defective so i have gone through replacement process which went well and good. Finally I received my first ever iPhone with all nuts and bolts properly sealed and satisfied through service by flipkart. (Add on happiness when i received "assembled in India" product though it my luck may be)

I feel as if the people who gave the iPhone XR low ratings either didn't know what they were getting or didn't do research. I did a lot of research about the XR by watching a lot of Youtube videos of what the XR had to offer and the changes made from the previous iPhone models. The first thing is that the XR doesn't have a Finger Print Home Button, instead it uses Face Recognition to unlock it or a Pin Code. The phone has a supreme build and a sturdy feel in hands. Coming from a 6S, I felt it was a bit too wide, but It’ll grow on you. The RED is by far the best color among available. And this one is an absolute battery champ and won’t let you down. Charging is also pretty fast if you use a fast charger. I use an iPad 12W charger to top it up and it goes from 10% to 90% within 90 mins. If we take in the factor of longevity of the iPhones (iOS support and updates for atleast next 5 years), this is ...

After using android for 10 yrs m, i moved to iOS and i must say its very difficult to find n use iPhone...i will come to this later , let me start with features: nice camera but not better than samsung note 8.. display bright n good .. nice sound and very good look... a bit bulky...
What irritates me :
1. Setting ur fav song as ringtone: torture to do that...
2. 90% of good app either wallpaper or ringtones or utility: are paid..
3 iCloud only 5gb..
4. Not able to migrate chrome bookmarks ...
The phone as expected is great . After a week’s use it is a good for moderate user. Not checked on games and heavy applications. But performance is good.
@Flipkart When i received the phone it was shipped just in a simple plastic bag with original phone box. Please ask your seller to pack the same in and outer card board box.

Screen:
1. This iPhone has HD screen but others have full HD. Still it doesn’t disappoint me while watching full HD video.
2. Perfect screen size, Not too big(8 Plus, XS Max) and Not very small(iPhone X or iPhone XS).
Design:
1. All these models (except 8 plus) have new iPhon...

Firstly users coming from Android platform trust me its very hard to cope at initial days, myself switched form Android after 10 years sticking out but you will gradually get to used to new platform.
Pros:
1. Display - 4.5/5 (6.1 inch display fit perfect in hand, and doesn't looks too big like Android devices in fact my MI A2 is bigger 5.5 inch pho...

Thanks to Flipkart & team for helping me with my replacement within stipulated time as they promised and thanx to seller too. My story didn't went well with device, first time i received product which was bit defective so i have gone through replacement process which went well and good. Finally I received my first ever iPhone with all nuts and bolts properly sealed and satisfied through service by flipkart. (Add on happiness when i received "assembled in India" product though it my luck may be)

I feel as if the people who gave the iPhone XR low ratings either didn't know what they were getting or didn't do research. I did a lot of research about the XR by watching a lot of Youtube videos of what the XR had to offer and the changes made from the previous iPhone models. The first thing is that the XR doesn't have a Finger Print Home Button, instead it uses Face Recognition to unlock it or a Pin Code. Second thing is that the Control Center has moved from swiping up from the bottom to ...

And this one is an absolute battery champ and won’t let you down. Charging is also pretty fast if you use a fast charger. I use an iPad 12W charger to top it up and it goes from 10% to 90% within 90 mins. The phone as expected is great . After a week’s use it is a good for moderate user. Not checked on games and heavy applications. But performance is good.

My story didn't went well with device, first time i received product which was bit defective so i have gone through replacement process which went well and good. Finally I received my first ever iPhone with all nuts and bolts properly sealed and satisfied through service by flipkart. (Add on happiness when i received "assembled in India" product though it my luck may be)

I feel as if the people who gave the iPhone XR low ratings either didn't know what they were getting or didn't do research. I did a lot of research about the XR by watching a lot of Youtube videos of what the XR had to offer and the changes made from the previous iPhone models. The first thing is that the XR doesn't have a Finger Print Home Button, instead it uses Face Recognition to unlock it or a Pin Code. 1st time i bought a phone immediately after launch in flash sale. Shifted from redmi note 7 pro to realme x2 after lot of reviews and research. i was thinking of note 8 pro, but when x2 launched, i decided to go for it after scratching my head a lot. First impression of the phone is quite good with super amoled display. its display is really crisp and sharp with nice sound quality. But main problem is Camera. its really not worth it. as compared to redmi, quality of 64mp is very poor, not ave...
After a research and confusion with many models in the market, I ended up buying this phone which gives you all the features in your budget.
I am happy to see good results in night mode as well as mind-blowing clarity in day light. 64 mega pixel is not that useful as you get good results in normal mode.
Battery life is good along with fast charging.

description.Other Display Features:
The OnePlus 7T’s smooth 90 Hz refresh rate is enhanced by over 370 optimizations in OxygenOS for seamless visuals and ultra-responsive touch design. Once you experience the smoothness of Fluid Display, you’ll never settle for anything less.
Binge all your favorites in jaw-dropping clarity with HDR playback on Netflix, YouTube, and Amazon Prime Video. HDR10+ produces deeper blacks, brighter whites, and more true-to-life visuals for stunning movies, games, and photos. Experience more immersive entertainment, anytime, anywhere.
Improved with new sensors and algorithms, our next-generation fingerprint reader is more accurate and more secure. Simply tap on the display to unlock the OnePlus 7T in an instant.
In direct sunlight, an astonishing 1,000 nits of brightness ensures that everything is clear and vivid. In the dark, TÜV-certified blue-light reduction allows for safer, more comfortable nighttime reading. It’s the smartphone display that’s designed to go anywhere.
description.Primary Camera Features:
Ultra wide angle : When shooting photos or videos, switch over to the ultra wide angle camera at the press of a button to instantly widen your frame to a dramatic 117° field of view. Even up close, effortlessly capture large group shots and sprawling landscapes.
Nightscape : Available on both the main camera and the ultra wide angle camera, Nightscape mode combines information from multiple frames in varying exposures to produce a wider dynamic range. The result? Bright, clear, dramatic photos—even in surprisingly dark environments.
UltraShot Engine : Optimized with our intelligent photography engine, the OnePlus 7T takes breathtaking photos, even in difficult lighting. From backlit portraits to sunsets at dusk, capture it all in remarkable clarity.
description.Secondary Camera Features: Front camera : The OnePlus 7T’s 16 MP front-facing camera has Portrait mode built right in for more impressive selfies, while EIS stabilization keeps videos smooth and steady when streaming or video chatting.

description.Other Display Features:
The OnePlus 7T’s smooth 90 Hz refresh rate is enhanced by over 370 optimizations in OxygenOS for seamless visuals and ultra-responsive touch design. Once you experience the smoothness of Fluid Display, you’ll never settle for anything less.
Binge all your favorites in jaw-dropping clarity with HDR playback on Netflix, YouTube, and Amazon Prime Video. HDR10+ produces deeper blacks, brighter whites, and more true-to-life visuals for stunning movies, games, and photos. Experience more immersive entertainment, anytime, anywhere.
Improved with new sensors and algorithms, our next-generation fingerprint reader is more accurate and more secure. Simply tap on the display to unlock the OnePlus 7T in an instant.
In direct sunlight, an astonishing 1,000 nits of brightness ensures that everything is clear and vivid. In the dark, TÜV-certified blue-light reduction allows for safer, more comfortable nighttime reading. It’s the smartphone display that’s designed to go anywhere.
description.Primary Camera Features:
Ultra wide angle : When shooting photos or videos, switch over to the ultra wide angle camera at the press of a button to instantly widen your frame to a dramatic 117° field of view. Even up close, effortlessly capture large group shots and sprawling landscapes.
Nightscape : Available on both the main camera and the ultra wide angle camera, Nightscape mode combines information from multiple frames in varying exposures to produce a wider dynamic range. The result? Bright, clear, dramatic photos—even in surprisingly dark environments.
UltraShot Engine : Optimized with our intelligent photography engine, the OnePlus 7T takes breathtaking photos, even in difficult lighting. From backlit portraits to sunsets at dusk, capture it all in remarkable clarity.
description.Secondary Camera Features: Front camera : The OnePlus 7T’s 16 MP front-facing camera has Portrait mode built right in for more impressive selfies, while EIS stabilization keeps videos smooth and steady when streaming or video chatting.

I did a lot of research about the XR by watching a lot of Youtube videos of what the XR had to offer and the changes made from the previous iPhone models. The first thing is that the XR doesn't have a Finger Print Home Button, instead it uses Face Recognition to unlock it or a Pin Code. New Review on 25/12/2019::
Only issues to be Highlighted:
Camera optimization
RAM Management (Huge issue)
Battery is little bit weak while using in ScreenOnTime (games only).
There is performance mode where you can adjust to save battery power - I'm using this at High performance and I get 1 day use perfectly.

23/12/2019::After a day of use:
This phone is perfectly valued for Money spent.

This is very disappointing by Micromax, after purchase on Flipkart, timly delivered by FK, look Good, Everything looking fine without sim, actually i buy it as gift to My old Maid, after few days ltr when i buy new sim and insert it, it just worked only on 31 july & 1 Aug only 2 days and stop working, only cancel/Power off key worked but rest of keys not working, So i decided to return it but 7 days passed, so i cant return it,
Actually it was gift and when you come to know it just totally w...

All features are good compared to the price, except the speaker, its very low quality. Small chinese toy speaker  delivers good voice than this. Unable to differentiate what other person is speaking. Still i prefer to keep the phone because my fathers requirement is torch and that is satisfactory in this phone.
Gifted it to my mother and she loves it. Good phone in affordable price 👍.

Flash light is decent
Looks good

reviews: Reviewing this after 2 months usage - I'll come straight to the points:
Major PRO's:
> Excellent Camera (in Daylight - Awesome, Fascinating / Night - Keep your hand steady/use tripod, you'll get outstanding images!!)
> SONY IMX 586 Sensor Never disappoints!
> Great display (Punchier colors, Black is deep black and it's smooth)
> DEDICATED Micro SD Card Slot (Dual SIM - Jio 4G & Airtel 4G and 128 GB Memory card I'm using, no lagging)
> Snapdragon 712 AIE - Gaming & other experiences are SMO...
Good Camera 👌👌
Good Battery Life ( About 8 hours of SOT with gaming (Pubg 2 hrs))
Vocc Charging is Amazing only take 1 hr to full charge

Gaming Is Good ( Play Pubg in Smooth - Ultra , HD - High , No HDR or Extreme Support)
Colors Os is Superb
Over all It is a good smartphone  Value Of Money
Don't think much go for it.!!!!!!

Total awesome experience .

After having used a flagship phone for more than 2 years, I wasn't sure if I would be able to live with a budget phone. My apprehensions were almost proved true by the Mi A3. It was so bad I sold the phone just 2 days after buying it. But then I decided to give this phone a go and has it surprised me. I went for 6+64 gb version in green color. Let me tell you a bit more about my experiences with the phone in last 4 days.
Pros:
1. Battery: I was hoping to get 6-7 hours of screen on time (SOT)...
Smooth experience with fast transitions and satisfying camera quality in a budget deal. Macro shots are unbelievable. It is gorgeous in its look and feels premium in hands. Liked the phone extremely
I am writing this review after using it for 5 days .
Pros : • Display quality is good with good contrast and sharpness. Black color looks more punchy like amoled display .

• Camera is very premium and captures decent pictures in both indoor and outdoor . Low light images are also very good in clarity with very few distortion . Front selfie camera as well take good pictures with lot of available customization .
• As loaded with SD712 the performance of is very smooth....

it’s worth buying on this budget..
4/5 my rating

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
The powerful small phone that I always wished for !!
Nowadays the fad is big screen phones but for me, I like a small powerful phone with awesome camera. Ticked all the boxes that I had in my mind.
Switched from android. Never going back!
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

As being a frequent apple user, I couldn't find much of a difference when comparing to IPhone 6.The size and display are the same of IPhone 6 and ofcourse there is 0 negative comments for the A13 chip. It is super fast✌️.
